info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 07 at 2:07PM MST until February 07 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: .Bare ground, strong winds, and low RH along with a frontal passage will continue to bring elevated to critical fire weather conditions to the Little Rockies and Missouri Breaks today. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 135, 136, AND 137... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 135, 136 and 137. * TIMING...Through later this afternoon. * WINDS...From the west at 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. Isolated gusts near 60 mph have been recorded near the higher elevations of the Little Rockies. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 11 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower 60s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start could spread rapidly to the east.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.
